attributes.action: Let The People choose who run the country. The government work for us, not them!
attributes.additional_details: The People have had no say about at least the last two Prime Ministers. The Government, including their “leader”, are servants to The People, so it should be the people who decide on “The Leader”. It’s time for General Election so The People can make the choice.
attributes.background: The last few Prime Ministers have been chosen by the party in power, not The People… how can that be right? If the PRIME Minister fails, why should their party choose the next one?! We need a General Election to give The People a say.
